title: Unstoppable
description:
Unstoppable is an adrenaline-pumping horror adventure where you’re tasked with escaping Schindler Tower. A mysterious gas has turned office workers insane … Now everyone is out for blood. Face dimly-lit corridors filled with death, search for clues to find a cure, and keep the psychotic horde at bay any way you can. Will you get to the bottom of the infection or die in the dark?
Challenging, physics-based combat. Feel the weight of each blow and dodge infected enemies. The infected do not all think alike – watch out for new weapons and attack patterns. Your weapons are limited – use them well. Balance item durability against increasingly difficult enemies. Play a game of cat and mouse in the shadows. Stay cautious – the infected can hear your footsteps! What is this mysterious gas, and who unleashed it? Unravel the global conspiracy with each new chapter. Strive to keep your humanity as the infection builds in your system. Stay sharp or join the infected. Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown

system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 / AMD Radeon RX 470
